name: Fathom Costa Maya Neoprene Dive Socks - Unisex
description: This low-profile dive sock fits in the foot pocket of your snorkelling or free diving fins to enhance both comfort and performance. Finished with flatlock seams to prevent chafing, it also features a durable aramid-reinforced sole.Made from 1mm neoprene.Flatlock seams prevent chafing.Sole is reinforced with aramid fibres for extra durability.
